title: Bought 20 dollar RP card and entered code and it says it was not properly activated.
body: I dont know what i should do

replies.body: how is it possible that when i want to buy RP it says you have encountered an error

I won't be able to help too with RP cards here on the boards. Your best bet would be to hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can look through your purchase history and get that sorted out!
